```{r}
filtrarRegistros <-  reactive({
  cantones_f <-
   cantones %>%
  dplyr::select(canton)
  
 
  if (input$canton != "Todas") {
    cantones_f <-
      cantones_f %>%
      filter(canton == input$canton)
  }
  
  return(cantones_f)
})
```

### Cuadrantes Urbanos

```{r}


bins <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
colores <- c(  "#FFFF33", "#B2FFFC", "#4DAF4A")
pal <- colorBin( colores, cuadrantes$COD_ZONA, bins=bins)


renderLeaflet({
 registros <-
  filtrarRegistros()
 

 # cuadrantes_c <- cuadrantes [registros, , op = st_contains]
  
  
  leaflet() %>%
    addTiles(group = "OSM") %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.NatGeoWorldMap , group = "NatGeo"
                     ) %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter, group = "CartoDB-Black"
                     ) %>%
    
 # addPolygons(
 #      data = regiones,
   #    color = "#red",
     #  fillOpacity = 0,
      # weight = 1,
       #opacity = 1,
       #stroke = TRUE,
       #group = "Regiones",
       #popup= paste0( "<strong> Región: <strong/>",
       #regiones$Region)
     #) %>%
    
      addPolygons(
      data = registros,
      color = "#00008B",
      fillOpacity = 0,
      weight = 1,
      opacity = 1,
      stroke = TRUE,
      group = "Cantones",
      popup= paste0( "<strong> Cantón: <strong/>",
      registros$canton)
    ) %>%
  
  addPolygons(
      data = cuadrantes,
      color = ~pal(COD_ZONA),
      fillOpacity = 1,
      weight = 1,
      opacity = 1,
      stroke = TRUE,
      group = "Cuadrantes"
    ) %>%
    
    addLegend(
      pal = pal,
      values = cantones$COD_ZONA,
      opacity = 1,
      title = "Zona"
    ) %>%
  
    addLayersControl(
      "bottomleft",
      baseGroups = c("OSM", "NatGeo", "CartoDB-Black"),
      overlayGroups = c(
        "Cantones" , "Cuadrantes"
      ),
      options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE)
    ) %>%
    addScaleBar("bottomright") %>%
    addMiniMap() %>%
    addResetMapButton() %>%
    addFullscreenControl() %>%
    addControlGPS() %>%
    addSearchOSM() %>%
    addMouseCoordinates()
  
})
```
